consentLabel:
Welcome to JoyMeter

part of the University of Oxford Meter Study on UK electricity use. The anonymous data you provide will be used for research.

help.btnNow: Start here to say what you do now
help.btnRecent: For activities in the past use this button
help.actList: Below you will find your activities. Scroll down and tap on them to make changes or add detail.
help.postcode: Enter your postcode to take part in the study
help.contactDetails: Please tell us how we can contact you

noInternet: Please first connect to the internet
noActivities: Report activities to see them here
title: Welcome
titleProgress: Tap the stars to see your progress
titleAuthorise: Authorisation via email. Please give your name.
titleAuthorised: You've been authorised. See Menu for extra options
titleDate: Pick a date to take part in the study
titleDay1: Please record your activities until tomorrow at 9pm
titlePersonalise: Personalise to take part in the study
titlePersonaliseFinish: Complete personalisation to take part in the study
titleSurvey: Today is your study day. Please start with a quick survey
titleWait1: You will get a parcel before
titleWait2: . Do attach the electricity recorder once you have it
